trans-unit.source: By default appends a text that is the result of invoking #inspect on self. Subclasses should override for custom pretty printing.

trans-unit.source: By default it takes the current errno value. The message is appended with the system message corresponding to the errno. Additional keyword arguments can be passed and they will be forwarded to the exception initializer

trans-unit.source: By default logs of all sources and severities will be captured.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,将捕获所有来源和严重性的日志。

trans-unit.source: By default the maximum nesting of arrays/objects is 99.

trans-unit.source: By default the maximum nesting of sequences/amppings is 99.

trans-unit.source: By default the newline is removed from the returned string, unless chomp is false.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，除非chomp为 false ，否则将从返回的字符串中删除换行符。

trans-unit.source: By default the process is configured to use pipes for input, output and error. These will be closed automatically at the end of the block.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,流程被配置为使用管道来处理输入、输出和错误。这些管道将在程序块结束时自动关闭。

trans-unit.source: By default the process is configured without input, output or error.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,流程配置为无输入、无输出、无错误。

trans-unit.source: By default the require path is the location of the standard library that comes with the compiler, and the "lib" directory relative to the current working directory (given by pwd in a Unix shell). These are the only places that are looked up.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，require路径是编译器随附的标准库的位置，以及相对于当前工作目录的“ lib”目录（由Unix shell中的 pwd 提供）。这些是唯一要查找的地方。

trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，此方法返回 nil ，但是提供缓冲或包装其他IO的IO实现应覆盖此方法。

trans-unit.source: By default, + is decoded as space character (0x20). If plus_to_space is false, + is decoded literally as +. Percent-encoded values such as %20 and %2B are always decoded as characters with the respective codepoint.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， + 被解码为空格字符（ 0x20 ）。如果plus_to_space为 false ，则 + 被字面上解码为 + 。百分比编码的值（例如 %20 和 %2B )始终与相应的代码点一起解码为字符。

trans-unit.source: By default, + is decoded literally. If plus_to_space is true, + is decoded as space character (0x20). Percent-encoded values such as %20 and %2B are always decoded as characters with the respective codepoint.

trans-unit.source: By default, a new array is created and returned for each consecutive call of #next.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， #next 每个连续调用创建并返回一个新数组。

trans-unit.source: By default, a new array is created and returned for each permutation. If reuse is given, the array can be reused: if reuse is an Array, this array will be reused; if reuse if truthy, the method will create a new array and reuse it. This can be used to prevent many memory allocations when each slice of interest is to be used in a read-only fashion.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，将为每个排列创建并返回一个新数组。如果提供了重用，则该数组可以被重用：如果重用是 Array ，则该数组将被重用；如果重用，则该方法将创建一个新数组并将其重用。当以只读方式使用每个感兴趣的切片时，这可以用于防止许多内存分配。

trans-unit.source: By default, a new array is created and yielded for each chunk when invoking #next.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，调用 #next 时，将为每个块创建一个新的数组并产生该数组。

trans-unit.source: By default, a new array is created and yielded for each consecutive slice of elements.

This can be used to prevent many memory allocations when each slice of interest is to be used in a read-only fashion.

trans-unit.source: By default, all Crystal files in ./src will be appended (i.e. src/**/*.cr). In order to account for load-order dependencies, source_file can be used to specify one (or multiple) entrypoints for the docs generator.

trans-unit.source: By default, the generated executables are not fully optimized. The --release flag can be used to enable optimizations.

trans-unit.source: Chained sequences of operator calls are restructured by the compiler in order to implement operator precedence. Enforcing operator precedence makes sure that an expression such as 1 * 2 + 3 * 4 is parsed as (1 * 2) + (2 * 3) to honour regular math rules.

trans-unit.source: Comparison is case-sensitive for POSIX paths and case-insensitive for Windows paths.
trans-unit.target: POSIX路径的比较是区分大小写的,Windows路径的比较是不区分大小写的。

trans-unit.source: Comparison is done byte-per-byte: if a byte is less then the other corresponding byte, -1 is returned and so on.
trans-unit.target: 逐字节进行比较：如果一个字节小于另一个对应的字节，则返回 -1 ，依此类推。

trans-unit.source: Concurrency safe. If many fibers try to set the atomic in parallel, only one will succeed.

trans-unit.source: Conditionally spawns a Fiber to run &block in the background. Access to get is synchronized between fibers. &block is only called once. &block doesn't run by default, only when get is called.
trans-unit.target: 有条件地生成 Fiber 以在后台运行和阻止。光纤之间同步获取访问。＆block仅调用一次。＆block默认情况下不运行，仅在调用 get 时运行。

trans-unit.source: Converts path to an absolute path. Relative paths are referenced from the current working directory of the process unless dir is given, in which case it will be used as the starting point.
trans-unit.target: 将路径转换为绝对路径。除非给出dir，否则将从进程的当前工作目录中引用相对路径，在这种情况下，它将用作起点。

trans-unit.source: Converts path to an absolute path. Relative paths are referenced from the current working directory of the process unless dir is given, in which case it will be used as the starting point. "~" is expanded to the value passed to home. If it is false (default), home is not expanded. If true, it is expanded to the user's home directory (Path.home).
trans-unit.target: 将路径转换为绝对路径。除非给出dir，否则将从进程的当前工作目录中引用相对路径，在这种情况下，它将用作起点。“〜”扩展为传递给home的值。如果为 false （默认），则不会展开home。如果为 true ，则将其扩展到用户的主目录（ Path.home ）。

trans-unit.source: Converts an Enumerable to a Hash by using the value returned by the block as the hash key. Be aware, if two elements return the same value as a key one will override the other. If you want to keep all values, then you should probably use #group_by instead.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用块返回的值作为哈希键，将 Enumerable 转换为 Hash 。请注意，如果两个元素返回的值与键相同，则一个将覆盖另一个。如果要保留所有值，则应该改用 #group_by 。

trans-unit.source: Converts to Int16. Truncates anything on the right side of the decimal point. In case of overflow a wrapping is performed.
trans-unit.target: 转换为 Int16 。截断小数点右边的任何内容。如果发生溢出，则执行包装。

trans-unit.source: Converts to a number of microseconds.
Converts to a number of milliseconds.
Converts to a number of nanoseconds.

trans-unit.target: 将下划线转换为驼峰形边界。
副本将元素从 self 计数为源。

trans-unit.source: Copies count elements from self into source. source and self may overlap; the copy is always done in a non-destructive manner.
trans-unit.target: 副本将元素从 self 计数为源。来源和 self 可能重叠；复制始终以非破坏性方式进行。
复制将 self 要素计入目标。

trans-unit.source: Copies count elements from self into target. If self and target overlap, behaviour is undefined. Use #move_to if they overlap (slower but always works).
trans-unit.target: 复制将 self 要素计入目标。如果 self 和目标重叠，则行为不确定。如果它们重叠，请使用 #move_to （速度较慢，但​​始终有效）。
副本将元素从源头算入 self 。

trans-unit.source: Copies count elements from source into self. source and self may overlap; the copy is always done in a non-destructive manner.
trans-unit.target: 副本将元素从源头算入 self 。来源和 self 可能重叠；复制始终以非破坏性方式进行。

trans-unit.source: Copies count elements from source into self. If source and self overlap, behaviour is undefined. Use #move_from if they overlap (slower but always works).
trans-unit.target: 副本将元素从源头算入 self 。如果源和 self 重叠，则行为是不确定的。如果它们重叠，请使用 #move_from （速度较慢，但​​始终可以正常工作）。

trans-unit.source: Copies a file or directory src_path to dest_path.
Copies a file or directory src_path to dest_path. If src_path is a directory, this method copies all its contents recursively.
trans-unit.target: 将文件或目录src_path复制到dest_path。如果src_path是目录，则此方法以递归方式复制其所有内容。

trans-unit.source: Copies a list of files src to dest.
Copies a list of files src to dest. dest must be an existing directory.
trans-unit.target: 将文件src的列表复制到dest。dest必须是现有目录。

trans-unit.source: Copies the contents of source into this slice.
trans-unit.target: 将源内容复制到此片中。

trans-unit.source: Copies the contents of this slice into target.
Copies the file src to the file dst.
Copies the file src to the file dst. Permission bits are copied too.
trans-unit.target: 将文件src复制到文件dst。权限位也被复制。

trans-unit.source: Copies the file src_path to the file or directory dest.
